content: Hello Bitcointalk community member and Bitcoin art collector I am creating bitcoin art since 2017. This creation of art will speak for itself:) We all know....Introducing the "Power Bull" Limited Edition - Hand-SignedAre you a collector of unique and meaningful artworks?Look no further than the "Power Bull" limited edition prints, now available for pre-sale on Bitcointalk.Each piece is hand-signed by the artist and block-stamped with the date of purchase,making it a one-of-a-kind addition to any collection.The inspiration behind the "Power Bull" artwork is the strength and determination of the bull market,symbolizing the power and resilience of the Bitcoin community.The print material is German paper Hahnem√ºhle, which is known for its high quality and longevity.Availability:1. SOLD as an acrylic panel2. SOLD as an acrylic panel,  bc1qqpm2rvcuftuf6ycunhuxumnjq2pu837nq2hras3. SOLD as an acrylic panel4. SOLD as an acrylic panel ,  bc1qukgye8vetdzlulsx8dpdkxdga6r445fngj9r3z5.6.7.8.9.10.11.12.Sale Details^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Only 8 of 12 unique pieces availablePayment address: [3PxBQNMxzfYFYP7cAWThCbVETUAQXEGDip]Pricing:Print/Poster:if you don't see the price ticker refresh the page BTC= per piece (approx. $100 USD)US shipping: 30-50$EU shipping: 15$Framed Acrylic panel:if you don't see the price ticker refresh the page BTC= per piece (approx. $400 USD)US shipping: 50-85$EU shipping: 29$How to Purchase1.Send the required amount of Bitcoin to the provided payment address2.Send a message to the seller on Bitcointalk with your shipping address(privnote)3.The seller will confirm receipt of payment and ship the arttwork to the provided address4.Enjoy your one-of-a-kind, hand-signed and block-stamped "Power Bull" limited edition!Bitcointalk strong together ¬† ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîFeel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.body: üëÄüî• This artwork is a perfect addition to any space, whether it be a home or office, and serves as a powerful reminder of the strength and potential of Bitcoin. The bull, with its fierce determination and strength, symbolizes the unstoppable force that is the Bitcoin community.Investing in this artwork is not only a smart financial decision but also a symbolic act of support for the Bitcoin movement. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own a stunning piece of art that reflects your beliefs and values. Order now and join the ranks of those who stand with Bitcoin!
